snippet: The performance by Sweden in winning the Open Teams at the Second World Mind Sports Games in France last month was remarkable.
abstract: Phillip Alder Bridge column on a deal played in the Open Teams at the Second World Mind Sports Games in Lille, France.
lead_paragraph: The performance by Sweden in winning the Open Teams at the Second World Mind Sports Games in France last month was remarkable.
